item.title: Retrieving cells without blank cells
item.description:
This is a sample script for retrieving cells without blank cells. In this sheet, the row 14 has one space. Figure 1 shows the sample spreadsheet.
Fig. 1: Sample spreadsheet.


  1. Retrieving cells with spaces and no blank cells.
  var data = SpreadsheetApp
             .getActiveSpreadsheet()
             .getActiveSheet()
             .getRange('a1:a30')
             .getValues();
  var Result = [!i ? null : i for each (i in data)]
               .filter(function(e) {
                 return (e != null)
               }).join('');

Result : Hello World

  1. Retrieving cells without both spaces and blank cells.
  var data = SpreadsheetApp
             .getActiveSpreadsheet()
             .getActiveSheet()
             .getRange('a1:a30')
             .getValues();
  var Result = [isNaN(i) ? null : i for each (i in data)]
               .filter(function(e) {
                 return (e != null)
               }).join('');

Result : HelloWorld
